summary: Iteration 14: UI/UX Improvements batch testing COMPLETE. All features verified working: (A) Report Error forms have proper Select dropdowns - Version page has Competition and Model dropdowns, Kit page has Type and Gender dropdowns. Request Removal button exists on both pages. (B) Landing page correctly shows no Browse button in nav, no Go to App button, shows Sign in with Google and Explore Catalog buttons. (C) Navbar correctly shows Browse, Database, Contributions in header (when logged in); My Collection/Wishlist NOT in header but in user dropdown; Contributions NOT in dropdown. (D) Profile page supports username-based URLs (/profile/:username) and has ImageUpload component for profile picture upload.
passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/users/by-username/{username} - returns user with stats (collection_count, review_count, submission_count)
Backend: POST /api/reports with report_type='error' - creates error report
Backend: POST /api/reports with report_type='removal' for version - creates removal report
Backend: POST /api/reports with report_type='removal' for master_kit - creates removal report
Backend: POST /api/reports with invalid report_type - returns 400
Backend: POST /api/reports for kit with Gender/Type corrections - works correctly
Frontend: Landing page (logged out) - Sign in with Google visible, no Browse in nav, Explore Catalog button visible
Frontend: Navbar (logged in) - Browse, Database, Contributions in header; My Collection/Wishlist in dropdown only; Contributions NOT in dropdown
Frontend: Kit Detail page - Report Error button opens form with Type (Select) and Gender (Select) dropdowns
Frontend: Kit Detail page - Request Removal button opens form with notes textarea
Frontend: Version Detail page - Report Error button opens form with Competition (Select) and Model (Select) dropdowns
Frontend: Version Detail page - Request Removal button opens form with notes textarea
Frontend: Profile page by username (/profile/:username) - loads public profile correctly
Frontend: Profile edit form - shows ImageUpload component with Upload/URL tabs and dropzone
critical_code_review_comments: Report form dropdowns use proper Select components with predefined options
Request Removal functionality properly integrated with report_type='removal'
Navbar correctly restructured with Contributions in header, My Collection/Wishlist in dropdown only
Profile page supports both /profile (own profile) and /profile/:username (public profile) routes
ImageUpload component with Upload and URL tabs provides flexible profile picture management
seed_data_creation: Created test user with username for testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: UI/UX improvements batch fully tested. Key features: (1) Report Error forms use Select dropdowns - Version: Competition (5 options), Model (3 options); Kit: Type (7 options), Gender (4 options). (2) Request Removal button creates reports with report_type='removal'. (3) Landing page restructured - no Browse in nav, Explore Catalog in hero. (4) Navbar restructured - Contributions in header, My Collection/Wishlist moved to dropdown only. (5) Profile supports username-based URLs and ImageUpload component.
